text: "Do the Strand" is a 1973 song by English rock band Roxy Music and is the leading single to their second studio album For Your Pleasure. It was released as a single in some countries but not in the United Kingdom. It was covered by Alphaville for their 2003 album CrazyShow. ==References== Category:1973 songs Category:Roxy Music songs Category:Alphaville songs Category:Glam rock songs Category:Dance-rock songs
title: Do the Strand
